Description: Rim sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery phiale mesomphalos; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; single band of dots alternating in added red and added white; below, lotus bud pattern in white outline with red centre; exterior: painted decoration consisting of female figure (only head, right arm and upper body remaining; with red on chiton and black dotted collar), to left.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 297, no. 981, pl. 137)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.2001) (phase 2)
